title: Whatever happened to Queensboro Steel on US 421?
text:
THe Alper family, which owned QUeensboro Steel, sold the business in
1997 to Metals USA, whcih still operates a facility here, although it
did close down one division of its business back in 2002. Here are a
couple of links with more information.





http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20041214/LAA0102/41214004





http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20020223/NEWS/202230325
